title: Woven Nook - Modern & Luxurious 20" x 20" Decorative Boho Throw Pillow Covers - Durable Quality & Machine Washable - Roux Design - Black and White - 4 Pack
features: CHIC DESIGNS: These cool, cute designs will be the perfect accent in any room in your home.
SQUARE PILLOW COVERS: These decorative covers will fit over most standard throw pillows.
HIGH QUALITY: Made from 100% woven, durable cotton. These are beautiful, well-made throw covers.
NEUTRAL COLORS: This combo of white, tan, and black will look perfect in any bedroom or living room.
MACHINE WASHABLE: These decorative covers are easy to clean; just toss in a cold wash cycle.
description: Modern, beautiful decor should be for everyone. At Woven Nook, we believe in creating high-quality, on-trend designs at an affordable price point. These throw pillow covers are the perfect accent for a bed, couch, or chair. Each 20" x 20" pillow cover will easily fit over standard-sized throw pillows. Please note that we do not provide the pillow cushions; these are pillow covers only. Whether your home is boho, farmhouse, or urban chic, these will fit in perfectly. Our throw cases are the perfect combination of modern, glam, and rustic. These canvas-textured pillow covers come in 3 unique designs: 1 with a modern, abstract shape; 1 with thin stripes; and 2 with solid-brown leather texture on one side and plain black linen style on the other. Anytime your decor needs a refresh, new pillow covers are the perfect, easy, and affordable solution. Make your sofa, loveseat, armchair, and boudoir into luxurious spaces with these neutral pillow covers. Whether your room is all beige or you have a colorful, vibrant space, these decorative accessories will fit in perfectly. Between pets, kids, and dinner in front of the TV, spills will happen. When they do, no need to stress. Our pillowcase sets can go straight into the washing machine on cold. When they are finished, just hang to dry, and you're good to go. The beauty of the throw pillow is that it is a small item that leaves a big impact. With our easy zipper, you can remove the covers and swap them out for a dramatic change. When you purchase our pillow covers, you can finally create the space you've been dreaming of.
